issue.message: Windows file separators (`\`) and drive letter separators (':') must be escaped (`\\`) in property files; use C\\:\\\\Users\\\\Yousef-Razzouk\\\\AppData\\\\Local
issue.explanation: All backslashes and colons in .property files must be escaped with a backslash (\). This means that when writing a Windows path, you must escape the file separators, so the path \My\Files should be written as `key=\\My\\Files.`

issue.message: Windows file separators (`\`) and drive letter separators (':') must be escaped (`\\`) in property files; use C\\:\\\\Flutter\\\\flutter
issue.explanation: All backslashes and colons in .property files must be escaped with a backslash (\). This means that when writing a Windows path, you must escape the file separators, so the path \My\Files should be written as `key=\\My\\Files.`
